text: Dbinera byapare kona jabaradasti ba badhya-badhakata ne'i. Nihsandehe hedayata gomarahi theke prthaka haye geche. Ekhana yara gomarahakari â€˜tagutaâ€™derake manabe na ebam allahate bisbasa sthapana karabe, se dharana kare niyeche sudrrha hatala ya bhambara naya. Ara allaha saba'i sunena ebam janena.
